name: VIRALWIPEOUT: VR Defender
description:
Hello. Thank you for your interest in the VIRALWIPEOUT: VR Defender v1.0 program.

VIRALWIPEOUT is a brand new piece of antivirus software created by alpha six productions. Breaking brand-new* ground with its new Virtual Reality Defender program (type VB-D1), VIRALWIPEOUT puts the control of antivirus protection firmly in your hands.

*if this were a real antivirus program

Using a basic "arrow keys to move, spacebar to shoot" control format, VIRALWIPEOUT is simple enough that even young children can destroy deadly computer viruses on your system. For more information, please see the Help screen, located on the title screen by pressing 'H'

The VIRALWIPEOUT: VR Defender program is still in development even after the release of v1.0, so be sure to keep an eye out for any fresh updates, such as new viruses (...to delete), expanded sector sets, new weapons (for virus deleting) and any other minor (or major) updates.

Please consider donating to the VIRALWIPEOUT project in order to support further updates and more games from alpha six productions. Thank you.

NOTE: This game is no longer supported.

background art made with help from Andi McClure & Michael Brough's "BECOME A GREAT ARTIST IN JUST 10 SECONDS"

game audio: remastered version of #IV: ruination - solar inception, from the EP "ruination"
